EmailTemplate.subject: {!Contact.FirstName}: Past Due
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Kelly, Sean, and Tim,
I am writing to bring to your attention that {!Contact.FirstName} for a {!litify_pm__Intake__c.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case has been non-responsive for the past seven days and has been marked as past due. Despite our repeated attempts to contact, we have not received any response.
We kindly request your assistance in establishing communication with {!Contact.FirstName}. If you are able to reach them, please warm transfer them to our team at (888) 327-1194. Our standard hours of operation are Monday-Friday 6:00am MST- 9:00pm MST and Saturday-Sunday 8:00am MST- 4:30pm MST. Your support in resolving this matter promptly is greatly appreciated.
Please note that this email serves as notice of a potential case that either needs to be credited or replaced based on the terms of the governing IO and MSA.
Thank you for your attention to this urgent issue.
Best regards, Saddle Rock Legal Group (888) 327-1194
